topic.title: Advance Directive Status Observation - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.37"
SHALL conform to Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.57) (CONF-99)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.1 STATIC 20061017 (CONF-100)
SHALL conform to Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.57)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-510)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-511)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="33999-4" Status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-512, CONF-513)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF-514, CONF-515)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.1 STATIC 20061017 (CONF-100)
Target of an entryRelationship whose value for "entryRelationship / @typeCode" SHALL be "REFR" 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC. (CONF-509)
SHALL NOT contain any additional Observation attributes. (CONF-517)
SHALL NOT contain any Observation participants. (CONF-518)
SHALL NOT be the source of any Observation relationships. (CONF-519)
